projects.name: GWorkspace - Personal Workspace
projects.description: A full-stack open-source personal workspace web application featuring a modern Glassmorphism design. Integrates productivity tools, a dynamic blog platform with user authentication, weather updates, and multi-search capabilities.
projects.description_zh: 采用现代玻璃拟态设计的开源全栈个人工作空间 Web 应用。集成了生产力工具、带用户认证的动态博客平台、实时天气更新以及多重搜索功能。

projects.name: Vana - Encrypted Document Vault
projects.description: An open-source cross-platform encrypted document management system emphasizing data security via zero-knowledge encryption. Features Git-based version control, multi-theme UI, and local AES-256 encryption.
projects.description_zh: 一个强调数据安全的跨平台加密文档管理开源系统，采用零知识加密技术。具有基于 Git 的版本控制、多主题用户界面和本地 AES-256 加密功能。

projects.name: CiteAI - AI Citation Generator
projects.description: A commercial AI-powered web application that automates the generation of academic citations. Streamlines the research process by accurately identifying sources and formatting them in MLA, APA, and Chicago styles.
projects.description_zh: 一款商业化 AI 驱动的 Web 应用，可自动生成学术引用。通过准确识别来源并将其格式化为 MLA、APA 和 Chicago 风格，极大地简化了研究流程。

projects.name: SurfSmart - AI Website Research
projects.description: The project is set up for 2025 UMD BitCamp, the main purpose is to improve website researching strategy by applying AI techniques. Frontend and fullstack reconstructor role with modern tech stack integration.
projects.description_zh: 为2025年UMD BitCamp设置的项目，主要目的是通过应用AI技术改进网站研究策略。担任前端和全栈重构者，负责现代技术栈集成。

projects.name: Twilight Zone - 2D Horror Game
projects.description: Unity engine motivated 2D storytelling & horror game. The purpose of the game is to figure out the way to save your friends by special game design, and explore the truth. Got inspired by 《House》. Full duty development with complete game creation.
projects.description_zh: 使用Unity引擎开发的2D叙事恐怖游戏。游戏目的是通过特殊的游戏设计找到拯救朋友的方法，并探索真相。灵感来源于《House》。全职开发，负责完整的游戏创作。

projects.name: Personal Resume Website
projects.description: My digital handshake with the world! This resume website, crafted with pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, transforms static career facts into an engaging, responsive, and bilingual experience. It's not just a resume; it's a personalized, performance-optimized portal to my professional journey, designed to make a memorable first impression – no fancy frameworks needed!
projects.description_zh: 我与世界的数字握手！这个纯粹由 HTML、CSS 和 JavaScript 打造的简历网站，将枯燥的职业信息转化为引人入胜、响应迅速且支持双语的互动体验。它不仅仅是一份简历，更是一个个性化、性能优化的专业旅程门户，旨在留下深刻的第一印象——无需任何花哨的框架！
